verses.name: Proverbs 10:18
verses.text: He that hideth hatred with lying lips, and he that uttereth a slander, is a fool.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:19
verses.text: In the multitude of words there wanteth not sin: but he that refraineth his lips is wise.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:20
verses.text: The tongue of the just is as choice silver: the heart of the wicked is little worth.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:21
verses.text: The lips of the righteous feed many: but fools die for want of wisdom.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:22
verses.text: The blessing of the Lord, it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:23
verses.text: It is as sport to a fool to do mischief: but a man of understanding hath wisdom.
